summary:
Medicine is about helping people stay healthy and get better when they're sick. It involves diagnosing, treating, and preventing diseases and injuries. Doctors use different methods like medicine, surgery, and therapy to help patients.

For a long time, medicine was based on tradition and belief. But now, it uses science to understand the body and how diseases work. Some people still use old-fashioned or alternative treatments, but these aren't always proven to be safe or effective.
title: Medicine
